Program listings

Two programlisting-s following each other should have proper vertical space between:

<foo />
<bar />

These are not too long:

123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678
123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678
123456789012345678901234567890123456789012345678

Just for the sake of structure

A simple section

Blah.

Footnotes:

  1. First footnote. Footnote content is inserted into the DocBook XML at the point of the reference, but visually it's usually moved out from that context, to the bottom of the page. Anyway, I'm just saying that so we will have a multi-line footnote, which may triggers some browser bugs or otherwise give a good preview of how longer footnotes look.

  2. Second footnote.

    A footnote may contains multiple paras, or even listings:

    • Blah

    • Blah blah

    and...

    System.out.println("... even programlistings!");
return 0;

  3. Third footnote.
